name: Toy Commander: Army Men
description:
Take your every army men and toy soldier to battle! Every corner of the house becomes a battlefield of an epic war, just like back in the childhood in our new war game.

Toy Commander features:

BATTLES IN A ROOM - lots of units and battle arenas make every clash unique and epic

FIGHT SMALL, PLAN BIG - Use all variety of terrains, unit types and upgrades to get an edge

EPIC WAR CAMPAIGNS - Take one of three sides in war for the house

If you have always dreamed of your toy soldier army coming alive, now you can make that dream true! Choose one of three sides, fighting for dominance in the house, and let them go to battle in kitchen, guest room or even your backyard.

Battles of toy armies are not only fun, but also tactically deep and challenging. Use specifics of each faction, its unique units, heroes and upgrades to tip the balance in your favor - become the master of the art of toy war in our game!

Let the fantasies of your childhood come true and become a warlord you have dreamed to be as a kid with box of toy soldiers. New epic clash of toys begins now!

Your army is awaiting your orders, commander! Time to seize your victory!
